attributes.action: ensure that the recent dictate by the UN that we "should be nicer to Muslims" in this country is put to a referendum of the people of this country before being acted upon by our government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are not yet an Islamist State and we already see Muslims being given preferential treatment on a daily basis, through fear that they will react violently, especially where it concerns the failure to deport Islamic Fundamentalist Terrorists who are a known and self declared threat to our society.  Our current population of non-Islamists is still in the huge majority and it is they who should be given the option to say what should happen to our society and how Muslims should be treated in our country, not the UN nor Islamists.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
